P004428.project_name: Industrial Investment and Smallholder Treefarming Project

project_abstract.cdata: The industrial portion of the Industrial Investment and Smallholder Treefarming Project (US$48.0 million) will be used by DBP to make sub-loans to finance direct imports for medium and relatively large industrial projects in manufacturing, agro-industrial, mining, ocean shipping, hotel projects. DBP will use the balance of US$2.0 million to finance about 1,300 participating smallholders in a pilot tree-farming project.
